Account.description: Account linked to the project planning

AccountCode.description: Account code linked to project planning

AccountName.description: Account name linked to project planning

BGTStatus.description: Status of the background task for project planning, 1 = To be processed, 2 = Processed, 3 = Failed

CommunicationErrorStatus.description: Status of the external calender linked to project planning, 0 = No error, 1 = Credentials error, 2 = Technical error, 3 = Both credentials & technical errors, 4 = In progress

Created.description: Date and time the record was created

Creator.description: The GUID ID of the user that created the project planning

CreatorFullName.description: The full name of the user that created the project planning

CustomField.description: Custom field endpoint. Provided only for the Exact Online Premium users.

Description.description: The description of the project planning

Division.description: The code of the company that the record is stored in

Employee.description: The GUID ID of the employee that is linked to the project planning

EmployeeCode.description: The code of the employee that is linked to the project planning

EmployeeHID.description: The numeric ID of the employee that is linked to the project planning

EndDate.description: The end date of the project planning, this is to indicate when the planning ends. E.g: End of a project

HourType.description: The type of hours entered for the project planning, item with 'Time' type

HourTypeCode.description: The code of the item with 'Time' type that is used in project planning, can be used for searching for hour type

HourTypeDescription.description: The description of the item with 'Time' type that is used in project planning

IsBrokenRecurrence.description: Indicates whether the project planning is separated from the recurring planning

Modified.description: Date the project planning record was modified

Modifier.description: The ID of the user that modified the project planning records

ModifierFullName.description: The full name of the user that modified the project planning record

Notes.description: Additional information on this project planning record

OverAllocate.description: Indicates whether the entries can have over allocated planning hours

Project.description: Project ID that is linked to the planning

ProjectCode.description: Project code that is linked to the planning

ProjectDescription.description: Project description that is linked to the planning

ProjectPlanningRecurring.description: Recurring planning linked to project planning

ProjectWBS.description: Referenced project work break down structure ID that is linked to the project planning

ProjectWBSDescription.description: Referenced project work break down structure description that is linked to the project planning

StartDate.description: Start date of the project planning

Status.description: Status of the project planning, 1 = Reserved, 2 = Planned

Type.description: Type of project planning, it will always be 4 for employee
